DataElement.preferredName: Company Specimen Shipping Material Communication Contact Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether there has been contact or communcation with the company or formal business entity responsible for materials used to ship or transport a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Company Specimen Shipping Material Communication Contact
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the contact or communcation with the company or formal business entity responsible for materials used to ship or transport a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any formal business entity for profit, which may be a corporation, a partnership, association or individual proprietorship.

Concepts.definition: Any formal business entity for profit, which may be a corporation, a partnership, association or individual proprietorship.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:A quantity obtained by multiplication.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.:A channel for communication between groups.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The act or business of transporting goods.
The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object.
A channel for communication between groups.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

PermissibleValues.value: No, kit will not be requested
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: No, kit will not be requested

ValueMeaning.preferredName: No, kit will not be requested
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No, kit will not be requested

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have you contacted Zemotak International to request kits to collect and ship the samples
